name: Lifeline (deadlocust)
description:
Yeah so I saw this game jam. Looked interesting. Supposed to make a game in 3 hours. Made a bad decision and decided to marathon the whole thing in one go, overshot by an hour. Oh well.

The game is just about a guy who really needs his pills. Is he drug addict? Is he sick? I don't know, you decide. Your only objective is to get that man his pills.

Game jam theme was "life line", I took this definition: a thing on which someone or something depends or which provides a means of escape from a difficult situation.

[A] - Move left

[D] - Move right

[E] - Interact

[R] - Restart

[TAB] - Open inventory

[ESC] - Exit game

Note: You can interact with literally anything in the game world.

Note 2: I noticed some bugs with dialog text centering. But with respect to the game jam's time limit, I will only fix them after the jam is over.
